description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission ref. PP/2013/0957 dated 03/07/2013 for change of use of part first, second and part third floor from office (Use Class A2) use to 8 residential flats (5 x 1bed, 3 x 2 bed flats) including first, second and third floor level rear extensions (with associated balustrades, rooflights and roof terrace) and external alterations (amendment to consist of revision of layout and siting of refuse facilities)
decision_conditions: The proposed amendments can be accepted as non-material amendments to planning permission PP/2013/0957 dated 03/07/2013, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
